volume_parallelepiped:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- The volume measure in a finite-dimensional inner product space gives measure `1` to the
parallelepiped spanned by any orthonormal basis. -/
theorem orthonormal_basis.volume_parallelepiped (b : orthonormal_basis ι (exprℝ) F) : volume (parallelepiped b) = 1 :=
  by
  haveI : Fact (finrank (exprℝ) F = finrank (exprℝ) F) := ⟨rfl⟩
  let o := (std_orthonormal_basis (exprℝ) F).to_basis.orientation
  rw [← o.measure_eq_volume]
  exact o.measure_orthonormal_basis b
#align orthonormal_basis.volume_parallelepiped orthonormal_basis.volume_parallelepiped
measure_orthonormal_basis:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⇑ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Sébastien Gouëzel
-/
/-- The volume form coming from an orientation in an inner product space gives measure `1` to the
parallelepiped associated to any orthonormal basis. This is a rephrasing of
`abs_volume_form_apply_of_orthonormal` in terms of measures. -/
theorem orientation.measure_orthonormal_basis (o : Orientation (exprℝ) F (Fin n)) (b : orthonormal_basis ι (exprℝ) F) :
    o.volume_form.measure (parallelepiped b) = 1 :=
  by
  have e : «expr ≃ » ι (Fin n) := by
    refine' Fintype.equivFinOfCardEq _
    rw [← _i.out, finrank_eq_card_basis b.to_basis]
  have A : «expr⇑ » b = b.reindex e ∘ e := by
    ext x
    simp only [orthonormal_basis.coe_reindex, Function.comp_apply, Equiv.symm_apply_apply]
  rw [A, parallelepiped_comp_equiv, alternating_map.measure_parallelepiped, o.abs_volume_form_apply_of_orthonormal,
    ENNReal.ofReal_one]
#align orientation.measure_orthonormal_basis orientation.measure_orthonormal_basis
measure_eq_volume:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- In an oriented inner product space, the measure coming from the canonical volume form
associated to an orientation coincides with the volume. -/
theorem orientation.measure_eq_volume (o : Orientation (exprℝ) F (Fin n)) : o.volume_form.measure = volume :=
  by
  have A : o.volume_form.measure (std_orthonormal_basis (exprℝ) F).to_basis.parallelepiped = 1 :=
    orientation.measure_orthonormal_basis o (std_orthonormal_basis (exprℝ) F)
  rw [add_haar_measure_unique o.volume_form.measure (std_orthonormal_basis (exprℝ) F).to_basis.parallelepiped, A,
    one_smul]
  simp only [volume, basis.add_haar]
#align orientation.measure_eq_volume orientation.measure_eq_volume
